?"],"id":"xNUBpqqejdGF"},{"cell_type":"code","metadata":{"colab":{"base_uri":"https://localhost:8080/"},"id":"legislative-titanium","executionInfo":{"status":"ok","timestamp":1627479907899,"user_tz":180,"elapsed":10,"user":{"displayName":"Guilherme
